tool_description: Our Crypto Price, Technical Indicators, and Signals API provides real-time data and insights for cryptocurrency traders and analysts. It offers access to current prices, detailed technical analysis, and predictive trading signals for a wide range of cryptocurrencies. Designed for seamless integration, this API empowers applications with the ability to analyze market trends and make informed trading decisions.
name: Crypto Price & Technical Indicators & Signals
title: Crypto Price & Technical Indicators & Signals

api_list.name: indicatorsBasedOnSymbols
api_list.description: Returns all calculated technical indicators for a specified cryptocurrency symbol.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com/indicators/BTCUSDT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com/indicators/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: macd
api_list.description: Retrieves the MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence) indicator for a specified symbol and timeframe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com/indicators/macd/BTCUSDT/1h"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price-technical-indicators-signals.p.rapidapi.com/indicators/macd/{symbol}/{timeframe}"

api_list.name: allInformationWithSymbol
